document_data.name: Faelas Xorlarrin
document_data.mainbody: '''Faelas Xorlarrin''' was a [[drow]] [[wizard]] of [[House Xorlarrin]] in [[Menzoberranzan]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Faelas was a competent Xorlarrin wizard. In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, he was a master of [[Sorcere]] and a coded letter was written to him about how [[Lolth]]'s current plan supported the idea of wizards joining the [[Ruling Council (Menzoberranzan)|Ruling Council]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1485}}, Faelas and his cousin and fellow Sorcere master [[Jaemas Xorlarrin]] accompanied the [[demon]] army led by [[Marilith (individual)|Marilith]] and [[Nalfeshnee (individual)|Nalfeshnee]]. They witnessed the defeat of the two [[demon lord]]s at the hands of [[Drizzt Do'Urden]], and [[Jarlaxle]] urged them to report the news to Matron Mother [[Zeerith Q'Xorlarrin]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, Faelas was not chosen to join the reformed [[House Do'Urden]].
